name: Trago (itch)
description:
Trago is a multiple ending narrative game about drinking shots in a real Brazilian pub atmosphere.

The player is Juca, a tired hard worker, who doesn't face his own problems very well. On a specially tiring night, Juca decides to stop on Trago, a regular pub on the way home, the best place to have a little chat and distraction. 

You, as a player, will be able to drink a huge quantity of shots to get courage and interact with Joana, Carlos and other elements in the bar, for example, do some phone-calls in order to discover the true mystery about Trago.

Drinking get an important role that allows Juca to be more confident on exploring its surroundings by unlocking new dialogues. However, if Juca is not aware of everything that happens, he may be in serious trouble.

FEATURES

✪ Four different episodes to discover the true about Trago;
✪ A dizzy drinking gameplay to make your night even better;
✪ Five possible ends guided by dialogues, achievements and phone-calls;
✪ Four types of exotic drinks to get you drunk;
✪ A great mystery to be discovered;
✪ Dynamic narrative: choose well which conversation will start first; you may end up losing important information;
✪ Fun and delightful dialogues, situations and a full of mysterious narrative;
✪ Effects and beautiful art - focus effects, smooth camera movements and a beautiful art style to contemplate.
